### Solicitation for Mechanical Maintenance Services for RCMP - Various Locations, SK
#### Solicitation Details

* **Contract Title**: Mechanical Maintenance Services for RCMP - Various Locations, SK
* **Procurement Number**: M5000-24-0954/A
* **Publication Date**: May 21, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 20, 2024 (16:00:00)
* **Contract Duration**: 24 months (with optional extension for up to 3 additional 12-month periods)
* **Location**: Various locations in Saskatchewan
* **Category**: SRV (Services)

#### Requirement Details

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking the services of a contractor to provide monthly, seasonal, mid-year, and annual preventative mechanical maintenance on temperature control and environmental mechanical systems at government buildings.

The selected contractor will be required to provide maintenance services for a period of 24 months, with an option to extend the contract for up to 3 additional 12-month periods.

#### Evaluation Criteria

* The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price per location will be recommended for award of a contract for a specific location with the lowest bid amount.
* Up to 5 contracts may result from the solicitation process.

#### Security Requirements

A security requirement is associated with this requirement.

#### Submission Requirements

Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at `NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca`.

#### Additional Information

* Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Canada is not responsible for information found on websites of third parties.
* The Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada applies to all contracting activities.
